item.description:
Hi everyone -

Due to scheduling conflicts at Off The Leash, we will need to reschedule our small doggie play fun to Sunday, March 29th! Many apologies and hope to see you there!

As always, the health and safety of our furry friends is our top priority. Please be sure that your dog(s) are current on their vaccinations. Specifically, bordatella, DHLPP and rabies.

Thanks and see you soon.

All the best,
Emily

group.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: March Meet Up
